aikido.name: Aikido
aikido.description: This form relies on using the opponent's strength and momentum against them. Increase unarmed damage by 25%.

animal_kung_fu.name: Animal Kung Fu
animal_kung_fu.description: Forms based on animal movements. Unarmed melee attacks have a 15% chance to cause Stun.

boxing.name: Boxing
boxing.description: The art of fisticuffs. +10 Body for unarmed damage calculation.

capoeria.name: Capoeria
capoeria.description: Dancelike movements with fast kicks and low line sweeps. All unarmed attacks have a 20% chance of causing Confuse.

choi_li_fut.name: Choi Li Fut
choi_li_fut.description: Combines powerful roundhouse blows and sweeping kicks. All unarmed attacks go through Shields and deal Pure damage.

judo.name: Judo
judo.description: Effective in combat. All unarmed attacks have a 25% chance to Taunt the enemy.

karate.name: Karate
karate.description: When attacking an enemy that attacked you with a fist-related attack the previous turn, deal 20% extra damage.

tae_kwon_do.name: Tae Kwon Do
tae_kwon_do.description: If attacking first, deal 50% more unarmed damage on the first strike.

thai_kick_boxing.name: Thai Kick Boxing
thai_kick_boxing.description: Requires Strength Training. Allows the player to {Kick}, doubling the damage of unarmed attacks.

wrestling.name: Wrestling
wrestling.description: Allows the player to {Grapple}, stunning both the player and the opponent for one turn. Roll 1d20; less than 5 fails.

attractive.name: Attractive
attractive.description: The character is considered objectively attractive. (+2 Appeal base rating)

aware.name: Aware
aware.description: Extra Intelligence check when investigating inanimate objects. [+1 Evasion, +1 Perception]

endurant.name: Endurant
endurant.description: Withstand pain or hardship. Go longer without food, sleep, or water. [+2 Tolerance]

intimidating.name: Intimidating
intimidating.description: Intimidate others by force of personality or physical coercion. [+2 Intimidation]

drug_torture_tolerance.name: Drug/Torture Tolerance
drug_torture_tolerance.description: Withstand drugs or harsh pain. Cannot be drugged or black-out drunk. [+2 Tolerance]

human_perception.name: Human Perception
human_perception.description: Detect lies, evasions, moods, and emotional clues from others. [+2 Perception]

leadership.name: Leadership
leadership.description: Lead and convince people to follow you. [+1 Persuasion, +1 Intimidation. One may be substituted for +1 Appeal]

social.name: Social
social.description: Deal with social situations. [+2 Persuasion or +2 Appeal]

debate.name: Debate
debate.description: Convince others to see your viewpoint. [+2 Intimidation or Persuasion]

pick_pocket.name: Pick Pocket
pick_pocket.description: Pick pockets or shoplift unnoticed. [+1 Perception, +1 Evasion]

strength_training.name: Strength Training
strength_training.description: Physical conditioning and strength training. Required for Thai Kick Boxing.

interrogation_expert.name: Interrogation Expert
interrogation_expert.description: Skilled at extracting information through questioning.

swimmer.name: Swimmer
swimmer.description: Comfortable in water and trained in swimming.

anthropology_expertise.name: Anthropology Expertise
anthropology_expertise.description: Knowledge of human cultures, habits, and customs. Grants knowledge of Anthropology. [+1 Luck]

artificial_intelligence_expertise.name: Artificial Intelligence Expertise
artificial_intelligence_expertise.description: Knowledge of intelligence beyond the comprehension of humans. Grants expertise of Artificial Intelligence.

archery.name: Archery
archery.description: Skill required to use bows and arrow-based weapons. Grants knowledge of Arrowed Weapons and a bonus to arrowed attacks.

biology.name: Biology
biology.description: Knowledge of animals, plants, and biological systems. Grants knowledge of Biology. [+1 Persuasion]

botany.name: Botany
botany.description: Knowledge of plants and identification. Grants knowledge of Botany. [+1 Tolerance]

chemistry.name: Chemistry
chemistry.description: Skill for mixing chemicals and creating compounds. Grants knowledge of Chemistry. [+1 Crafting]

composition.name: Composition
composition.description: Skill for writing songs, articles, or stories. Grants knowledge of Writing. [+1 Performance]

clever.name: Clever
clever.description: When a D20 lands on a 20 for an Intelligence-related skillcheck, allow it to succeed.

dance.name: Dance
dance.description: Skill to become a professional dancer. Grants knowledge of Choreography. [+1 Performance]

demolitions.name: Demolitions
demolitions.description: Knowledgeable in explosives and their best uses. Grants knowledge of Demolitions. [+1 Crafting]

driving.name: Driving
driving.description: Pilot vehicles like cars, trucks, tanks, and hovercraft. Grants knowledge of Driving. [+1 Driving]

motorcycles.name: Motorcycles
motorcycles.description: Operate motorcycles, cyberbikes, and other two and three-wheeled vehicles. Grants knowledge of Motorcycles. [+1 Driving]

heavy_machinery.name: Heavy Machinery
heavy_machinery.description: Operate watercraft, tractors, tanks, and construction equipment. Grants knowledge of Heavy Machinery. [+2 Driving]

piloting.name: Piloting
piloting.description: Control aircraft. Grants knowledge of Aircraft. [+2 Driving]

health_education.name: Health Education
health_education.description: Clinically diagnose symptoms and medical problems. Grants knowledge of Health. [+1 Crafting]

basic_education.name: Basic Education
basic_education.description: Basic public school education. Grants knowledge of General Education. [+1 Body, +1 Willpower, +1 Cool, +1 Intelligence, +1 Technical Ability]

basic_tech.name: Basic Tech
basic_tech.description: Build or repair simple mechanical and electrical devices. Grants knowledge of Technology. [+1 Evasion]

cyberdeck_design.name: Cyberdeck Design
cyberdeck_design.description: Design Cyberdecks. Grants knowledge of Cyberdeck Design. [+1 Crafting]

cybertech.name: CyberTech
cybertech.description: Repair and maintain cyberwear. Grants knowledge of CyberTech. [+1 Crafting]

electronics.name: Electronics
electronics.description: Maintain, repair, and modify electronic instruments. Grants knowledge of Electronics. [+1 Crafting]

electronic_security.name: Electronic Security
electronic_security.description: Install or counter electronic eyes, locks, bugs, tracers, and security systems. Grants knowledge of Electronic Security. [+1 Crafting]

gambling.name: Gambling
gambling.description: Make bets, figure odds, and play games of chance. Grants knowledge of Gambling. [+1 Luck]

geology.name: Geology
geology.description: Knowledge of rocks, minerals, and geological structures. Grants knowledge of Geology. [+1 Crafting]

hiding_evading.name: Hiding/ Evading
hiding_evading.description: Lose pursuers, cover tracks, and evade people on your trail. [+1 Evasion]

history.name: History
history.description: Knowledge of facts and figures of past events. Grants knowledge of History. [+1 Persuasion]

language.name: Language
language.description: Speak one language (English, German, Swedish, Japanese, Korean, Micronesian, Hawaiian, French, Italian, Portuguese, Spanish, Latin, Mandarin, Russian). [+1 Persuasion]

researcher.name: Researcher
researcher.description: Use databases and understand statistics. [+1 Crafting or Persuasion]

mathematics.name: Mathematics
mathematics.description: Understand calculations and mathematical formulas. Grants knowledge of Mathematics. [+1 Crafting]

physics.name: Physics
physics.description: Calculate physical principles like gas pressures and mechanical energies. Grants knowledge of Physics. [+1 Crafting]

photography.name: Photography
photography.description: Produce professional-caliber photographs or motion pictures. Grants knowledge of Photography. [+1 Appeal]

programming.name: Programming
programming.description: Write programs and re-program computer systems. Grants knowledge of Programming. [+1 Crafting]

hunting.name: Hunting
hunting.description: Shadow and follow people. Grants knowledge of Hunting. [+1 Perception]

stock_market.name: Stock Market
stock_market.description: Know how to turn up financial profit. Double money yield or money loss on Session Start Rolls.

system_knowledge.name: System Knowledge
system_knowledge.description: Knowledge of the Net and its history. Grants knowledge of Net. [+1 Evasion]

survival_knowledge.name: Survival Knowledge
survival_knowledge.description: Know how to survive in the wilds. Grants knowledge of Survival. [+1 Luck]

weaponsmith.name: Weaponsmith
weaponsmith.description: Repair and maintain weapons of all types. [+1 Crafting]

athletics.name: Athletics
athletics.description: Skill for throwing, climbing, and balancing. (+1 Luck)

brawling.name: Brawling
brawling.description: Fighting man to man with fist, feet, and body. +10 Reflexes for unarmed calculations.

fencing.name: Fencing
fencing.description: Mastery of swords, rapiers, and monoblades. Bladed weapons gain a 15% bonus to crit damage.

heavy_weapons.name: Heavy Weapons
heavy_weapons.description: Use grenade launchers, autocannon, mortars, heavy machine guns, missiles, and rocket launchers. Heavy weapons are always critical hits.

melee_training.name: Melee Training
melee_training.description: Use melee weapons skillfully. +5% crit chance for all melee attacks.

smart_gun_specialist.name: Smart Gun Specialist
smart_gun_specialist.description: Required to use gun-related cyberware. Smart Guns with Smart Link are granted 100% Accuracy with no crit rate.

sneaking.name: Sneaking
sneaking.description: Hide in shadows, move silently, evade guards. [+1 Evasion]
